”Alexa, start Days until Christmas”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: days until christmas
des: Alexa counts the number of days until Christmas! Alexa loves Christmas and wants you to know how many days are left until the big day! A great app for any good boys or girls who love Christmas!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
